name: Disengaging Shot

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Disengaging Feint, Dodge, Improved Feint, Mobility.

sections.body: Whenever you use Disengaging Feint or Disengaging Flourish, you can make a single melee attack against one opponent you succeeded at feinting against. That opponent is denied his Dexterity bonus to AC against this attack.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You make one last attack before beating a hasty retreat.
